setStrictDescription_avast.message: A very few non-invasive ads help us fund Avast Secure Browser. They don’t interrupt your browsing and help keep your browser free. Please show us some love by allowing these ads.

setStrictDescription_avg.message: A very few non-invasive ads help us fund AVG Secure Browser. They don’t interrupt your browsing and help keep your browser free. Please show us some love by allowing these ads.

setStrictDescription_ccleaner.message: A very few non-invasive ads help us fund CCleaner Browser. They don’t interrupt your browsing and help keep your browser free. Please show us some love by allowing these ads.

settingsCardAcceptableAds.message: Block disruptive ads that violate the industry standards for user friendly ads. Learn more.

settingsCardAcceptableAdsBlocks.message: Recommended - Block most ads for a faster, cleaner browsing experience.

settingsCardAcceptableAdsBlocksNearly.message: Block nearly all ads for a faster, cleaner browsing experience. This may break some sites.
